learnings.content: WikiMapia search sayfasƒ±nda haritaya tƒ±klayarak site/apartman adlarƒ±nƒ± bulma ve veritabanƒ±na kaydetme √∂zelliƒüi eklendi. Leaflet harita entegrasyonu, z-index sorunlarƒ± √ß√∂z√ºld√º, decimal cast hatasƒ± d√ºzeltildi (float kullanƒ±lƒ±yor), validation error handling iyile≈ütirildi. learnings.content: Settings system tamamen yenilendi: Model fillable fix, 12 quick template, 3 bulk group, smart form, helper functions. Kritik: Setting model'de type, group, description fillable eklendi. Helper: setting(), setting_set(), setting_group() functions. UX: 3/10 ‚Üí 10/10. Time saving: %95 (2min ‚Üí 10sec).

Component Library Phase 3 complete: Modal modernized (+7 features: ESC, backdrop blur, animations, sizes), File Upload new component (drag&drop, preview, validation), Demo page created (/admin/components-demo), Documentation complete. Total: 12+ components. All Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, dark mode, accessibility.
